Hi, I'm Joel.

I'm a Frontend Developer that builds attractive and efficient websites utilizing modern technologies.

See my work

About Me

I'm a former Aerospace Engineer that specialized in Dimensional Metrology (nothing to do with the weather!). I'm now a Frontend Developer that enjoys solving problems with software, rather than hardware. I've had a big interest in computers since I can remember and these days I love creating enjoyable experiences on the web.
